name: Arrows Going Nowhere
description:
This is a simple puzzle game to test your mind and relax to. There are 50 levels, and custom color themes if you beat the game. 

If you'd like to try it out, you can check out the online version here. Keep in mind that only the downloadable version saves your progress! https://simmer.io/@Sympuppy/arrows-going-nowhere

How to Play:

  • Click the arrows to make them move in the direction they point.
  • When two arrows collide, the moving arrow disappears and the hit arrow rotates 90 degrees clockwise.
  • If an arrow reaches the top of the screen, it disappears.
  • Complete levels by getting rid of every arrow!
